response.overview: Are asylum seekers "frauds" attempting to settle in our society with impure intentions? If more refugees settle in South Korea, will our society fall into chaos? Are they outsiders who drain our taxes and contribute nothing to society? To find answers to these questions, a KBS news team embarked on a long journey to meet refugees from various parts of the world in honor of World Refugee Day.
response.title: 나의 난민, 너의 난민
